  1. ideArt App

    Created a multiplatform application for both web and mobile. A social media app for artists get inspiration to create new art and share their work. Uses an AWS backend to power both applications.

    Mobile app link
    • React
    • Flutter
    • AWS Amplify
    • DynamoDB
    • Amazon Cognito
    • GraphQL API

  2. Link Customer SaaS

    The project scenario was to design a system to triage, facilitate, and respond to customer support inquiries for B2C retailer services. We developed a solution for businesses to scale and modernize their way of communicating with customers.

    • Next.js
    • Tailwind CSS
    • Stream Chat SDK
    • Node.js
    • Firebase
    • Twilio API
    • Zapier Email API

  3. Resume Parser

    This tool is made for resume parsing that automates the process of reading through resumes. Users upload a resume and, using a serverless GraphQL API, AWS Lambda and Amazon Textract is leveraged to query for important resume information with machine learning and stored in a DynamoDB table. A dashboard with the resumes is shown where a user can search for a specific skill or keyword.

    • React.js
    • Bootstrap 5
    • React Router
    • AWS Amplify
    • Amazon S3 Bucket
    • AWS Lambda GraphQL API
    • Amazon Textract ML Parsing
    • DynamoDB

  4. GhibliPal

    Studio Ghibli is an anime film studio that creates beautifully detailed story films. This iOS and Android app can help people discover these beautiful classic films by Studio Ghibli and keep track of the films as they watch them.

    • Flutter
    • Dart
